live.name: LIVE
live.title: (Shooting on model / Furniture)
live.description: This smart studio system of 8m2 allows you to shoot your photos and videos of live models or scenographies in just a few minutes. Saved camera and light presets.

horizontal.name: HORIZONTAL
horizontal.title: (Flat packshots)
horizontal.description: Horizontal allows you to style and shoot your products flat with the automatic removal of the background.

vertical.name: VERTICAL
vertical.title: (Ghost)
vertical.description: Choose vertical and give your products a 3D ghost effect.

eclipse.name: ECLIPSE
eclipse.title: (Accessories / Leather goods / Shoes / Sunglasses)
eclipse.description: Designed for accessories photography and video. Saved camera and light presets.

cyclorama.name: CYCLORAMA
cyclorama.title: (Free production)
cyclorama.description: Our 30m² cyclorama allows you to mobilize a production team and carry out your photo and video shooting on an infinite white background.

postproduction.name: RETOUCHING
postproduction.title: (Post-production)
postproduction.description: In addition to our photo and video shooting services on our machines, we offer retouching services with different packages according to your needs.

pricing.title: Choose the service.s that suit you

cyclorama.description: Our cyclorama rental is by quote only. To receive a quote, please contact us using the form below. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

self_service.title: SELF-SERVICE: shoot with full autonomy
self_service.description:
Need professional visuals without hiring a full production team? With our self-service option, you can easily manage your shoots on your own. 

 Book a slot on one of our machines – Vertical, Horizontal, Eclipse, or Live – and bring your products. Our machines are user-friendly and accessible to everyone: no need to be a professional photographer, it’s as intuitive as shooting with an iPhone. 

 Upon arrival, our team will guide you through the setup and configure the equipment to fit your needs. Once everything is set, you’re free to shoot with ease. 

 Perfect for brands managing their own production, self-service gives you access to top-tier equipment without constraints. And if needed, an operator can assist you on request.

full_service.title: FULL-SERVICE: we take care of everything
full_service.description:
Short on time or simply want to outsource your visual production? Choose our full-service option. 

 Send us your products, and we take care of the rest: receiving, shooting, and post-production. With our expertise and state-of-the-art equipment, we deliver flawless visuals, ready to use on your e-shop or social media. 

 Perfect for brands and e-commerce businesses looking for professional results without having to be on-site, our full-service option guarantees a seamless process, with polished images delivered on time. 

 Trust us—we’ve got it covered.

contact.title: Do you have any questions?
contact.subtitle: Any specific needs?
contact.description: Do not hesitate to contact us by filling in the form on the right. we will answer as soon as possible.

placeholders.message: An idea for a project, need a quote, make an appointment ? Write to us :)
